Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget

Contains the base implementation for widgets.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUiDispatcher
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiDispatcher.
    AbstractUiDisplay
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiDisplay.
    AbstractUiModeChanger
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiModeChanger.
    AbstractUiWidget<VALUE>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidget.
    AbstractUiWidget.AccessHelper
    This inner class gives access to methods not visible in the public API.
    AbstractUiWidget.HandlerContainer
    A simple adapter containing a UiHandlerEvent.
    AbstractUiWidgetActive<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterActive,VALUE>
    This is the abstract base implementation of a focusable UiWidget.
    AbstractUiWidgetClickable<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterClickable,VALUE>
    This is the abstract base implementation of a clickable UiWidget.
    AbstractUiWidgetComposite<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapter,CHILD extends UiWidget>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetComposite.
    AbstractUiWidgetDynamicComposite<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterDynamicComposite<CHILD>,CHILD extends UiWidget>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetDynamicComposite.
    AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiContext using UiSingleWidgetFactoryNative.
    AbstractUiWidgetNative<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapter,VALUE>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidget or more precisely UiWidgetNative.
    AbstractUiWidgetRegularAtomic<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapter>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetRegular for atomic widgets (widgets that are not composite and therefore never have children).
    AbstractUiWidgetSingleComposite<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterSingleComposite<CHILD>,CHILD extends UiWidget>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetSingleComposite.
    AbstractUiWidgetSingleMutableComposite<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterSingleMutableComposite<CHILD>,CHILD extends UiWidget>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetSingleMutableComposite.
    AbstractUiWidgetSwitchComposite<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterSwitchComposite<CHILD>,CHILD extends UiWidget>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidgetSwitchComposite.
    AbstractUiWidgetWithLabel<ADAPTER extends UiWidgetAdapterWithLabel>
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiWidget in combination with a label.

Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget Description

Contains the base implementation for widgets.

Client UI Base Widget

This package and its sub-packages contain the base implementation for Client UI API Widget. All implementations of that API should extend the base classes provided here.
